subject: Pro x ultra 4th axis?
description_text:
Hi I'm having a problem with my pedals showing a 4th input and it's set
around halfway so it's interfering when setting other inputs. Software is
2.0.8.

Any help would be appreciated.

Thanks

Christian

conversations.body_text: Hi clanc 86,  In the “Settings - Update” section, click “Manual Firmware Update,” then navigate to the pedals-firmware folder → pedals folder → and select the proxultra.sfu file to update. This firmware will disable the 4th axis.
